discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: {{GENDER:|Fo}} na nyɛ la duoro ka neɛ kaŋa wa wa di dɛmo paalaa a dɛmo a dɛmmo diibo zie ŋa. Fo na toɔŋ leɛre la fo duori danworo waaloŋ a yi a pɛrɛfɛrɛnsere zieŋ.
discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-dismis: A segɛɛŋ, n nyɛ o la
discussiontoolsdebug-title: Di dɛmmo kyaare a toma boma yɛlɛ waaloŋ
discussiontoolsdebug-intro: A gampɛle ŋa wulo la a [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:N kɔkɔre/Extension:Dɛmmo diibo Toma boma Dɛmmo diibo Toma boma extension] nyɛ wulo la a threads aneŋ teɛroo yɛlyaga naŋ be a gampɛle ŋa pampana '''[[:$1]]'''. Fo na baŋ nyɛ la o tɔna a debugging yɛlɛ poɔ ne a extension bee baŋ lɛ na ka o tona. A duoro ŋa na la be la a [[$2|discussiontoolspageinfo API]].
discussiontools-desc: Boma na naŋ baŋ soŋ a kombo diibu vuo
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Yeli gampɛlɛ]] are where people discuss how to make content on {{SITENAME}} the best that it can be. {{GENDER:|You}} can use this page to start a discussion with others about how to improve [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Noba naŋ be {{SITENAME}} naŋ baŋ toŋ neŋ la a [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|kombo vuo]] a naŋ toɔle noba zaa duoroo {{GENDER:|you}}, kyɛ ka fo naŋ nyɛ la teɛre ma ka ba naŋ e o
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Noba naŋ be {{SITENAME}} naŋ toɔŋ toŋ neŋ la [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|yɛlɛ pɛlɛ]] a toɔle noba duori kyaare maalembo yineŋ IP aderese {{GENDER:|fooŋ}} tono neŋ a pampana.
 IP aderese yaga zaa leɛre la wagere mine kaŋa, kyɛ maŋ toɔle ko amine noba bamine. Fo naŋ baŋ [$1 maale la akante] bee [$2 kpɛ o poɔ] a vɛŋ nendaare kaŋa burburo neŋ tontonneba mine kpɛ yiibu. Maale akante a sɔgle a fo  IP aderese.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-tem:
Noba naŋ be  {{SITENAME}} na baŋ tone la [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|talk page]] a toɔle neŋgyamaa duoroo ko a {{GENDER:|fooŋ}}.

Gbɛɛ yaga, [[{{MediaWiki:tempuser-helppage}}|ŋa na saŋɛɛ]]. Ka fooŋ naŋ kyaa nyɛrɛ teɛrema, a naŋ nyɛ teɛrema duoroo mine, [$1 maale akante] bee [$2 kpɛ o poɔ].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|yɛlɛ pɛlɛ]] e la zie noba naŋ maŋ did demmo kyaare lɛ yelzu ko a {{SITENAME}} lɛ naŋ senne ka o waa. Piili demmo kyaare lɛnɛɛ fo na naŋ gyooneŋ ane peɛre taa {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|aneŋ}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Boŋ {{GENDER:|you}} yeli ka a kyɛ naŋ e la gyamaa zie ka ba nyɛ.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Talk pages]] e la zie na noba naŋ maŋ di demmo kyaare neŋ lɛ ba naŋ naŋ de maale yelnyɔgeraa a {{SITENAME}} poɔ a lɛ naŋ senneka o are. Toŋ neŋ a gampɛle ŋa a piili naŋ a demmo kyaare neŋ a maale emmo naŋ be IP aderese. Boŋ {{GENDER:|you}} yeli kyɛnaŋ toɔle gaa la ziir ka noba nyɛ.A IP aderese yaga leɛre la wagere mine, kyɛ maŋ poŋ gaa noba yaga ziiri.
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: {{GENDER:|fo waabo yaane}} a fo yeli gampɛle
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an: {{GENDER:|fo waabo yaane}} a fo yeli gampɛle
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-te: {{GENDER:|fo waabo yaane}} a fo wagere zaa yeli gampɛle
discussiontools-emptystate-title-user-an: {{GENDER:|fo waabo yaane}} a yeli gampɛle ŋa
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict:
{{GENDER
:|fo}} yelteɛbo ba toɔŋ nyɛ bimmo, bonson neɛ kaŋa yelteɛ o la a saŋa na fo naŋ da yeli. Sɔroo la leɛ enyɛ, bee leɛ yuo a gampɛle a kaa nyɛ a yeltɛbo saama.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Ba toɔŋ nyɛ yelteɛre {{GENDER:|foo la }} iree a gampɛle noɔre. O na baŋ yi la bee gaa gampɛle yogi poɔ.

Sɔroo
 {{GENDER:|la yuo}} a pɛle kyɛ la kpɛ nyɛ.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl:
A
 "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" liŋki kombaŋ de iri yelteɛbo nɔɛ. Ka foo na iri a noɔre, sɔroo {{GENDER:|de}} a pɛle gbuli maalembo zaa ane "$1" neɛbo
discussiontools-findcomment-results-id:
A yeteɛbo naŋ taa ID be la a ama  {{PLURAL
:$1|page|pages}}:
discussiontools-findcomment-results-name: Yelteɛbo neŋ yoe mine be la a ama {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}}:
discussiontools-ledesection-button: Zanne yelyaga a gampɛle ŋa poɔ
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-bu: Kpɛ o poɔ a nyɛ teɛrema ka yelzu wa a gampile poɔ
discussiontools-newtopicssubscription-no:
{{GENDER
:|You}} will no longer receive notifications when new topics are started on this page.
discussiontools-notification-added-topic: Yelzu paala "$4" maale a be $3 neŋ $2.
{{PLURAL :$1|yelzu paala kaŋa|$1 yelzu paala|100=99+ yelzu paale}} a "$2".
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: {{GENDER:|fo}} naŋ toɔŋ baŋ ba la nyɛ teɛrema kyaare a {{PLURAL:$1|a yeklzu ŋa|a yelzuri ama}}.
Yelzu "$4" da nyɛ la o boɔbo bee yineŋ $3.

{{PLURAL
:$1|yelzu kaŋa a e la |$1 yelzuri da eɛ|100=99+ yelzuri da eɛ}} nyɛɛ boɔbo bee yi a $2 poɔ.
Yelzu "$4" da nyɛɛ boɔbo bee yiibu.

{{GENDER
:|fo}} koŋ la nyɛrɛ teɛrema ka yelzu wa nyɛ boɔbo bee yi.
Fo koŋ toɔŋ leɛre a [[Special:Preferences#mw-prefsection-echo-echosubscriptions|a fo boɔboore]].
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL :$1|nɔ-iri paala kaŋa|$1 nɔ-iri paaba|100=99+ nɔ-iri paaba}} a"$3".
discussiontools-permalink-comment-copied: Liŋki kyaare yelteɛma koopi la Bea kilipboo poɔŋ.
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-pu: A fo yelteɛma da nyɛ la terebo.
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-to: A fo yelzu da paalɛɛ la
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-:
ka
 {{GENDER:|fooŋ}} piili dɛmmo paala bee yelteɛ dɛmmo koraa kaŋa, fo naŋ nyɛ la teɛrema otomatikalli ka noba bamine tere yelteɛma o poɔ.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: Ka maaŋ kaa dɛmmo diibu gampɛle na naŋ ba maale sɛre.
Ŋaa na wuli fo la wulluu kaŋa fo naŋ eŋ a yelzu paale.
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel: Ŋaa na wuli fo la liŋki ka fo iri a noɔre a yeli gampɛle yelteɛma neŋ neɛbo yeni yoŋ
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo: Yuo maale emmo boma a yizie moode
Ŋaa naŋ eŋ la tuulbaa a nɔ-iri weouŋ ane yelzu paale yɛlɛ mine emmo' yizie moode naŋ paale ŋmaa lɛ ko pingyi ane liŋkiri emmo.
discussiontools-preference-summary:
Fo naŋ toɔŋ zanne la kyaare a yɛlɛ ama yineŋ kannoo ko a 
[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary feature summary].
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: Ŋaa na vɛŋɛɛ la ka fo kpɛ a nyɛrɛ teɛrema yineŋ yelteɛre a yelzuri zaa poɔ.
discussiontools-preference-visualenhance: Ŋaa na yuo la yelI paala gampɛle waaloŋ naŋ paale yɛlɛ mine a dɛmmo kaŋa zaa diibu poɔ.
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon:
A
 {{GENDER:|fo}} sereŋ boɔrɔ ka fo meele a yelteɛma fo naŋ sɛgerɛ?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: Fo {{GENDER:|fooŋ}} sereŋ boɔrɔ ka fo meele bare a yelzu fo naŋ sɛgerɛ?
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback: {{GENDER:|poŋ a nyaabo}}  kyaare neŋ a yɛlɛ ama
discussiontools-replywidget-keyboard-sho: Fo naŋ baŋ neɛ la $1a toɔle tere a fo yelteɛbo
discussiontools-replywidget-reply: A lɛɛru ŋa natoɔɔ seŋ ka o zɛgedo. Wuli tɛɛtɛɛlong

discussiontools-replywidget-watchthis: De a ganzu ŋa paali fo [[Special:Watchlist|watchlist]]
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: A yelteɛbo kontoɔ nyɛ. O naŋ baŋ yi la bee gaa zie kaŋa
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Yelteɛbo paale mine koŋ baŋ nyɛ. A naŋ baŋ saaŋ la bee gaa zie kaŋa.
discussiontools-target-heading-missing: A yelzu ŋa kontoɔŋ nyɛ. O naŋ baŋ saaŋ la bee yi gaa zie kaŋa
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: Kpɛ teɛrema a yelzuri ama poɔŋ a gampɛle ŋa?

discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: {{GENDER:|Subscribe}} a naŋ nyɛ teɛrema a yelteɛbo ama

{{GENDER
:|Unsubscribe}} a na bare teɛrema nyaabo kyaare a yelteɛbo paale ama poɔ.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: A kpeɛbo naŋ wuli a URL ba taa nyaabo.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Fo na woŋi/nyɛ la yelkaŋa kyaare ne a yelzu paalaa ŋa.
Fo koŋ la baŋ nyɛ yeli zaa kyaare ne a yelzu paala ŋa
Fo iri la a fo sagedeebo bare
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription: Teɛrema ka neɛ tɔɔle yelteɛbo paala N naŋ  {{GENDER:|subscribed}} te.
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: A yeli gampɛle yelteɛbo da be la a maale emmore ŋa

tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Tontonneba eŋ la yelzu paala a gampɛle neŋ dɛmmoboma
